Buick finally had cars Americans wanted to buy - then came tariffs  —  General Motors' (GM.N) Buick was on a roll.  Sales for the once-stodgy brand were up 39% in the first quarter with a refreshed lineup of compact SUVs including the Envision, Encore GX, and the Envista, its top-selling SUV for under $30,000.

DHL suspends high value US deliveries over tariffs  —  DHL Express is suspending deliveries to the US worth more than $800 (£603) because of a “significant increase” in red tape at customs following the introduction of Donald Trump's new tariff regime.

Trump's Tariffs Won't Even Let You Drink Your Way Through these Tough Times  —  One evening last week I came home and mixed myself a cocktail.  That night it was a riff on a martini.  I started with a bottle of Botanist gin, which is distilled in Scotland with a broad range of local botanicals like apple mint, birch leaf, and heather.
